price: As for the one who is given his Record in his right hand, he will say, “Here is my Record, read it!
arabic: فَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ بِيَمِينِهِۦ فَيَقُولُ هَآؤُمُ ٱقۡرَءُواْ كِتَٰبِيَهۡ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
